description: Number of colorings of labeled graphs on n nodes using exactly 4 colors, divided by 4!*2^6.
references: F. Harary and E. M. Palmer, Graphical Enumeration, Academic Press, NY, 1973, p. 18, col. 4 of Table 1.5.1 (divided by 64).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: R. C. Read, The number of k-colored graphs on labelled nodes, Canad. J. Math., 12 (1960), 410â€”414.
crossrefs: Cf. A000683. A diagonal of A058843. A224068.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
